title: For sale: T332 Helmar Stamp SOLD -- Thanks, Tom
author: Archive

posts.post_title: For sale: T332 Helmar Stamp SOLD -- Thanks, Tom
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Rob D.
Graded authentic by SGC. I'm guessing the "A" is because of the odd cut, because this stamp measures the same as others that were given a numeric grade by SGC. Regardless, it looks nice, especially in the holder, and it's a HOFer of a somewhat tough issue. Check or money order, and if I recognize you from the board I'll ship the day after we reach a deal to make up for the no-PayPal delay.



(P.S. I do not anticipate a bump with a lower price in the next 8-12 hours.)



Thanks, Rob

wolfie51sb@aol.com





[IMG]http://i496.photobucket.com/albums/rr327/wolfie51sb/t332rube.jpg[/IMG]
